item.title: Add an RSS-Feed to your blog with Lithium
item.description: Adding an RSS-Feed to your blog with li3 is really straightforward, because all the infrastructure you need is already at your fingertips. I assume that you already have some posts stored in your database, you serve them to your users via /posts and the new RSS-File should be accessible via /posts.rss. First, we need to tell Lithium that we want to add another Media-Type to our application. Add the following to your app/config/bootstrap/media.
